import React from 'react'; import { useHistory } from 'react-router-dom'; import { ReactComponent as Edit } from 'prop-types'; import './dashboard.sass'; const Dashboard = ({ books, confirmDelete }) => { const { push } = useHistory(); return ( {books.map((item) => { return ( ) })}
